songs.title: My Soul Is a Witness
songs.words:
Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
My soul is a witness for my Lord.

Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
My soul is a witness for my Lord.

Samson! He was the strongest man.
You read it in the Bible and you understand.
And way back yonder in ancient times,
Old Samson fought those Philistines.

Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
Sampson was a witness for my Lord.

Noah! He was a righteous man.
You read it in the Bible and you understand.
The Lord appeared to him in the dark
And commanded Noah to build the ark.

Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
Noah was a witness for my Lord.
Noah was a witness for my Lord.

Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,
My soul is a witness for my Lord.

Oh, witness, witness for my Lord,
Who will be a witness for my Lord?
Witness, witness for my Lord,
Witness, witness for my Lord,

Who will be a witness,
Who will be a witness,
Who will be a witness,
Who will be a witness

(clap-clap) For my Lord,
For my Lord, 
For my Lord,
For my Lord?

My soul is a witness for my Lord!

songs.title: Praise His Holy Name (JW Pepper)
songs.words:
Sing till the power of the Lord come down.
Shout Hallelujah! Praise His Holy Name!
Sing till the power of the Lord come down.
Shout Hallelujah! Praise His Holy name!

Amazing grace, how sweet the sound
that saved a wretch like me;
I once was lost, but now I'm found,
Was blind, but now I see. 

Jesus, Jesus, how I love Thee!
Shout Hallelujah! Praise His Holy name!

Sing till the power of the Lord come down.
Shout Hallelujah! Praise His Holy Name!
Sing till the power of the Lord come down.
Shout Hallelujah! Praise His Holy name!

Must Jesus bear the cross alone
And all the world go free?
No, there’s a cross for ev'ryone
And there’s a cross for me.

Jesus, Jesus, how I love Thee!
Shout Hallelujah! Praise His Holy name!

Sing till the power of the Lord come down.
Shout Hallelujah! Praise His Holy Name!
Sing till the power of the Lord come down.
Shout Hallelujah! Praise His Holy name!

Holy Jesus Praise His Name,
Oh! Hallelujah! Praise His Holy Name
Hallelujah! Let us Praise His Name,
Hallelujah, Lord!

Praise His Holy Name!  
Holy Jesus Praise His Name,
Oh! Hallelujah!
Praise His Holy Name!

Let us Praise His Name,
Hallelujah, Lord!
Praise His Holy Name!  
Holy Jesus Praise His Name,
Oh! Hallelujah! 
Praise His Holy Name!

Rest - clap - rest - clap

Praise His Name!
Praise His Holy Name, 
Praise His Name!

Oh, oh, Praise His Holy Name!
Oh, oh, Praise His Holy Name!
Praise Him!

songs.title: On Jordan's Bank the Baptist's Cry
Lord of the Dance
songs.words:
Dance, dance, dance, dance
Dance, then, wherever you may be:
I danced in the morning when the world was begun,
And I danced in the moon and the stars and the sun;
And I came down from heaven and I danced on the earth,
At Bethlehem I had my birth.

“Dance, then, dance, then, 
I’m the Lord of the Dance,” said he, “and I’ll
Lead you all, wherever you may be,
And I’ll lead you all in the Dance,” said he.

Dance, then, dance, then dance: I
danced for the scribe and the Pharisee
But they would not dance and they wouldn’t follow me.
I danced for the fishermen, for James and John —
They came with me and the Dance went on.

“Dance, then, dance, then, 
I am the Lord of the Dance,” said he,
“And I’ll lead you wherever you may be, and I’ll 
Lead you all in the Dance,” said he.

Dance, dance, dance, dance,
Dance, then, wherever you may be:

I Danced on the Sabbath and I cured the lame; the
Holy people said it was a shame. They
Buried my body and they thought I’d gone — but
I am the Dance, and I still go on.

“Dance, then, dance, then,
I’m the Lord of the Dance,” said he, “and I’ll
Lead you all, wherever you may be, and I’ll
Lead you all in the Dance,” said he.

Dance, dance, dance, dance,
Dance, then, wherever you may be:

I Danced on a Friday when the sky turned black; it’s
Hard to dance with the devil on your back. They
Whipped and they stripped and they hung me on high, and they
Left me there on a cross to die. 

“Dance, then, dance, then,
I’m the Lord of the Dance,” said he, “and I’ll
Lead you all, wherever you may be, and I’ll
Lead you all in the Dance,” said he.

Dance, dance, dance, dance,
Dance, dance, dance, dance,
Dance, dance, dance, dance,
Dance, dance, wherever you may be:

They cut me down and I leapt on high;
“I am the Life that’ll never, never die. I’ll
Live in you if you’ll live in me;
I am the Lord of the Dance,” said he.

“Dance, then, dance, then,
I’m the Lord of the Dance,” said he, “and I’ll
Lead you all, wherever you may be, and I’ll
Lead you all in the Dance,” said he.

songs.title: Holy Spirit, Living Breath of God
songs.words:
Holy Spirit, living Breath of God,
Breathe new life into my willing soul.
Let the presence of the risen Lord
Come renew my heart and make me whole.

Cause Your Word to come alive in me.
Give me faith for what I cannot see.
Give me passion for Your purity.
Holy Spirit, breathe new life in me.

Holy Spirit, come abide within.
May Your joy be seen in all I do.
Love enough to cover every sin
In each thought and deed and attitude.

Kindness to the greatest and the least
Gentleness that sows the path of peace.
Turn my strivings into works of grace.
Breath of God, show Christ in all I do.

Holy Spirit from creation's birth
Giving life to all that God has made
Show Your power once again on earth;
Cause Your Church to hunger for Your ways.

Let the fragrance of our prayers arise.
Lead us on the road of sacrifice,
That, in unity, the face of Christ
may be clear for all the world to see.

Holy Spirit, living Breath of God
Breathe new life into my willing soul.

songs.title: Living in the Imagination of God
God Himself is Present (Worship - In the Presence)
Beautiful Savior - TTBB, solo words differ in this recording
songs.words:
(Hum)

Fair are the meadows, Fairer the woodlands,
Robed in flowers of blooming spring;
Jesus is fairer, Jesus is purer,
He makes our sorr’wing spirit sing.

Beautiful Savior, 
Lord of the nations,
Son of God and Son of man.

Glory and honor, 
Praise adoration,
Now and forever more be thine,
Now and forever more be thine.

songs.title: Put a Little Love in Your Heart (with Love Train) - TTBB
songs.words:
People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.
People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.

People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.
People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.

Take a good look around,
and if you’re lookin’ down,
Put a little love in your heart.

I hope when you decide,
kindness will be your guide,
Put a little love in your heart.

And the world will be a better place.
And the world will be a better place
For you and me
You just wait and see.

People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.
People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.

Another day goes by,
and still the children cry
Put a little love in your heart.

If you want the world to know,
We won’t let hatred grow.
Put a little love in your heart.

And the world will be a better place.
And the world will be a better place
For you and me
You just wait and see.

People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.
People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.

Put a little love in your heart
Put a little love in your heart

Put a little love.

People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.
People all over the world, join hands,
Start a love train, love train.

People all over the world, join hands,
Put a little love in your heart.

songs.title: Spirit of God, Descend Upon My Heart
World Without Walls - Music by Newlove Annan (pictured)
songs.words:
Place my feet on the land
where no barriers stand,
And it’s people have sense
to reject every fence
Till each obstacle falls 
in a world without walls.

With God’s grace from above 
fill each heart with such love
That we cease from our fights 
while we prize what unites
And we teach in our halls 
of a world without walls.

Quickly sound through the din
Over color of skin,
Though the prism seems white,
It’s all colors of light
That are blended by all
In a world without walls.

Help the young work with old,
And the rich share their gold;
Make our ignorance flee,
And its slaves be set free 
Till we help those who fall
In a world without walls. 

Everyone on this earth 
is our neighbor by birth, 
And our Lord has decreed 
That we hear and we heed
As humanity calls
For a world without walls.
